name: Neon Car
description:
Neon Car is Top down Car shooter. The player can drive a car with four different weapons, which are upgradeable. He has to defend his base from other cars. The longer he survives and the more cars he destroys, the higher his score gets.

Neon Car is a prototype game, I just wanted to test some gameplay mechanics and see what I can do within a months in my spare time. It would be nice to hear from you, what feature you like or dislike and why.

Visit my Artstation page
